member.name: T:FlightManager.Data.ApplicationDbContext
member.summary: Represents the application database context that extends IdentityDbContext for user authentication.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The options to be used by the DbContext.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DbSet for Flight entities.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DbSet for Reservation entities.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DbSet for ReservationUser entities.

member.summary: Configures the model relationships and constraints for the database context.
member.param: The builder being used to construct the model for this context.

member.name: M:FlightManager.Data.ApplicationDbContext.SaveChanges
member.summary: Saves all changes made in this context to the database and cleans up orphaned ReservationUsers.
member.returns: The number of state entries written to the database.

member.summary: Represents an application user that extends the IdentityUser class.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.AppUser.ReservationUsers
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of reservation users associated with this user.

member.name: T:FlightManager.Data.Models.ErrorViewModel
member.summary: Represents the view model for error pages.

member.summary: Gets or sets the request ID associated with the error.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.ErrorViewModel.ShowRequestId
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to show the request ID.

member.name: T:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight
member.summary: Represents a flight with its associated properties and validation rules.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for this flight record.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.FromLocation
member.summary: The departure location of the flight. This field is required.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.ToLocation
member.summary: The destination location of the flight. This field is required.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.DepartureTime
member.summary: The departure time of the flight. This field is required.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.ArrivalTime
member.summary: The arrival time of the flight. This field is required.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.AircraftType
member.summary: The type of aircraft used for this flight. This field is required.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.AircraftNumber
member.summary: The registration number of the aircraft used for this flight. This field is required.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.PilotName
member.summary: The name of the pilot assigned to this flight. This field is required.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.PassengerCapacity
member.summary: The maximum number of passengers that can be accommodated on this flight. This field is required and must be at least 1.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.BusinessClassCapacity
member.summary: The maximum number of passengers that can be accommodated in business class on this flight. This field is required and cannot exceed the total passenger capacity.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.Reservations
member.summary: A collection of reservations associated with this flight.

member.name: M:FlightManager.Data.Models.Flight.Validate(System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext)
member.summary: Validates the properties of this flight object.

member.name: T:FlightManager.Data.Models.Reservation
member.summary: Represents a reservation for a flight.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Reservation.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of this reservation.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Reservation.CreatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the reservation was created.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Reservation.ReservationUserId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the user who made this reservation.

member.summary: Gets or sets the associated ReservationUser object.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Reservation.FlightId

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Reservation.Flight
member.summary: Gets or sets the associated Flight object.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Reservation.Nationality
member.summary: Gets or sets the nationality of this reservation's passenger.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of ticket for this reservation.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Reservation.IsConfirmed
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the reservation has been confirmed via email.

member.summary: Gets or sets the confirmation token for email verification.

member.name: P:FlightManager.Data.Models.Reservation.ConfirmedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the reservation was confirmed.

member.summary: Validates the current object and returns any errors as a collection of ValidationResult objects.
